segments.advisor_message: Let's talk a bit about your health. How would you describe your current state of health? Any details that come to mind would be helpful.
segments.client_message: Um, yeah, so, like, my health—it's, uh, okay I guess? I mean, I smoke, uh, like, maybe a pack, a pack a day or something. Since, hmm, I think I was 18? And, uh, oh! I don't have a will, right? Thought about it, but there's nothing set up. Uh, never even thought about power of attorney, not really sure how that works either, honestly. I guess just trying to make sure I'm, like, good? Like, I don't need long-term care or anything... right now!
